definition: to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(civil engineering) cutting (for a railway or highway)
Fall into the moat and you'll be wiser next time (idiom); One only learns from one's mistakes.
pinyin: chi1 yi1 qian4 , zhang3 yi1 zhi4

sentences.english: Thirdly, the slope protection for cutting side slope is simply designed.
sentences.chinese: 最后简单设计了路堑边坡坡面防护。

sentences.english: They have railed the meadows off from the new railway cutting.
sentences.chinese: 他们已用栏杆把草地和新铁道的路堑隔离开来。

sentences.english: Taking Yishu graben as an example, the application of these methods is presented.
sentences.chinese: 并以伊舒地堑汤原断陷为例，说明了这些方法的应用。

sentences.english: This article has also carried on the analysis to the hard soil and soft rock slope of landslide characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 本文还对硬土软岩路堑边坡滑坡的特点进行了分析。

sentences.english: South China Sea is a marginal graben block bounded by crustal faults.
sentences.chinese: 南海是由岩石圈断裂所围限的陆缘地堑断块。

sentences.english: The Fuxin basin is a late Mesozoic NNE-trending graben coal-bearing basin.
sentences.chinese: 阜新盆地属于晚中生代NNE向地堑式煤盆地。

sentences.english: The vertical mean P axis in the southern part of Fen-Wei Graben indicates tensional tectonic movement there.
sentences.chinese: 汾渭地堑南段平均P轴直立，显示张性构造运动。

sentences.english: There are two types of it-cut and fill.
sentences.chinese: 路基有两种类型，即路堑和路堤。

sentences.english: A half-graben is a downdropped block bounded by a normal fault on only one side.
sentences.chinese: 半地堑是向下陷落的断块，只在一侧是以正断层为界。

sentences.english: Thispaper summarizes the problems of the heavy cutting projects.
sentences.chinese: 本文总结了深挖方路堑存在的问题。

definition: name of a hill in Hunan
